title: Why does Riot hate Fiora so much?  Why are they such jerks to Fiora?  It's affected the gameplay.
body:
Fiora isn't the same champion since the Rework.

She heals all the teamates who want to her to die before they help every game.

How is that thinking of Fiora players?

I am still disgusted by this act of slapping the name of my champ on one that is nerfed to heal all the people who hate me.

Why can't I get Riot to undo the Rework? 

Is it really just because they hate Fiora?

Why do you spam like this? Just learn the new Fiora, good lord.

It's been _insert length of time the rework has been around_ years already.

How do you know you're not the heartless callous person that hates differing opinions on Fiora?
If you cared about Fiora you wouldn't change  her in the 1st place.  Just like you wouldn't change a thing about your girlfriend and make her start lifting weights and stop wearing make up.

She was perfect...

Now shes a big disappointment.
Just for the record everyone who down votes this post is admitting that they are just a random jerk who hates Fiora.
Yes I hate Fiora and bronze 5 posts like these.
You are a hater just admit it.  You are no better than RIot.
Well Riot allows bronze players to post.I would not.
Only because I used to own your top LCS players with ease on the old Fiora.  You are all still bitter I am like 100X better than Double lift.

I used to get pentakills...  Level 1 pentakills.  But Riot stopped that from being possible when the nerfed her lunge. 

That is ruining Fiora.
